short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Turn you New Tab page into a nice and customizable Home Page
short.de: Verwandeln Sie Ihre Neue-Tab-Seite in eine schöne und anpassbare Startseite.
short.es: Convierte tu página de Nueva Pestaña en una Página de Inicio agradable y personalizable
short.fr: Transformez votre page Nouvel Onglet en une page d'accueil agréable et personnalisable.
short.pt_BR: Transforme sua página de Nova Aba em uma Página Inicial agradável e personalizável.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Cool New Tab Page replaces your default New Tab page with a customizable page. 

-Add an unlimited amount of Website Links.
-Chose between 63 wonderful Wallpapers, or select your own.
-Organize your Links in Tags.
-Quick access to Google and Microsoft Apps.

Version 1.0.2
-Added Option to Hide Menu/Widget Button.
-Added Dark Theme style to items that were missings.
-Fixed the bug that added a website more than 1 item from the right-click menu
-Other Minor changes and fixes.
long.de,es,fr,pt_BR:
Cool New Tab Page replaces your default New Tab page with a customizable page. 

-Add an unlimited amount of Website Links.
-Chose between 63 wonderful Wallpapers, or select your own.
-Organize your Links in Tags.
-Quick access to Google and Microsoft Apps.
